name: Visionarium
description: Visionarium is a visionary music driven VR journey. In this experience a visionary trance state is simulated.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 Storage: 3 GB available space
